title: vAnOr vaNangum
sahitya:
anupallavi

A:  gAnam sheidu un aruL sammAnam vizhaiyum
 inda dInan enadabhISTa dAnam sheidaruL vandu


caraNam 1    vANI maNamalar koL vENI kuyil pazhikkum vANI
 manjuLa sukha pANI caturmukhan tan
 rANI nayanam adilENI samAnaiyAm kal-
 yANI vEda pustaka pANI indiran mudal
  caraNam 2    tEnum kashakka vINA gAnam sheyyum jnAna-vi
jnAna dhana sukha nidAni annavAhani
nninattil nI tarum jnAnak-kaNNAl aladiv-
vUnakkaNNAl manidark-kAna payan uLadO
  caraNam 3    ambA akhila jagadambA unai idayam
nambAda unnaruL virumbAda enadu perum-
bAdhakam tolaikka shembhAgamAit-tudi tozhum-
pAr rAmadsan tozhum pAvana caritri
